sections.title: A Spell C\be\tker \for a World Language: T\be New Mi\troso\ft’s Spanis\b Spell C\be\tker Flora Ramírez Bustamante, Al\fredo Arnaiz, Mar Ginés

On\f\tMicrosof\b\tWay\t
R\fdmond,\tWA\t98052\t
{florarb,alarnaiz,margin\fs}@microsof\b.com\t

Abstra\tt This\tpap\fr\tr\fpor\bs\t work\tcarri\fd\tou\b\t \bo\td\fv\flop\t a\tsp\fll\fr\tfor\t Spanish\ta\b\tMicrosof\b\t Corpora\bion,\tdiscuss\fs\t \bh\f\t \b\fchniqu\f\tfor\t isola\b\fdword\t\frror\tcorr\fc\bion\tus\fd\tby\t\bh\f\tsp\fll\fr,\tprovid\fs\tg\fn\fral\td\fscrip\bions\tof\t\bh\f\t\frror\tda\ba\tcoll\fc\bion\tand\t\frror\t\bypology,\tand\tsurv\fys\ta\t vari\f\by\tof\tlinguis\bic\tconsid\fra\bions\tr\fl\fvan\b\twh\fn\td\faling\twi\bh\ta\tworld\tlanguag\f\tspr\fad\tov\fr\ts\fv\fral\tcoun\bri\fs\tand\t\fxpos\fd\t\bo\tdiff\fr\fn\b\t languag\f\tinflu\fnc\fs.\tW\f\tshow\t\bha\b\t\fv\fn\t\bhough\ti\b\thas\tb\f\fn\tclaim\fd\t\bha\b\t\bh\f\ts\ba\b\f\tof\t\bh\f\tar\b\tfor\tprac\bical\tapplica\bions\tbas\fd\ton\tisola\b\fd\t word\t\frror\tcorr\fc\bion\tdo\fs\tno\b\toff\fr\talways\ta\ts\fnsibl\f\ts\f\b\tof\trank\fd\tcandida\b\fs\tfor\t\bh\f\tmissp\flling,\t\bh\f\tin\broduc\bion\tof\ta\tfin\fr-grain\fd\t ca\b\fgoriza\bion\t of\t \frrors\t and\t \bh\f\t us\f\t of\t \bh\fir\t r\fla\biv\f\t fr\fqu\fncy\t has\t had\t a\t posi\biv\f\t impac\b\t in\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\fr\t applica\bion\t d\fv\flop\fd\t for\t Spanish\t(\bh\f\tcorr\fsponding\t\fvalua\bion\tda\ba\tis\tpr\fs\fn\b\fd).\t \t

sections.title: 1. Introdu\ttion
paragraphs: An\timpor\ban\b\tissu\f\tfor\tany\tNLP\tsys\b\fm\tis\thow\t\bo\td\fal\t wi\bh\tunknown\twords.\tWords\tcan\tb\f\tunknown\tfor\tdiff\fr\fn\b\t r\fasons:\t \bh\f\t word\t is\t no\b\t includ\fd\t in\t \bh\f\t l\fxicon\t us\fd\t by\t \bh\f\t sys\b\fm\t b\fcaus\f\t i\b\t is\t a\t prop\fr\t nam\f,\t a\t n\fologism,\t a\t for\fign\t word,\t \f\bc.,\t or\t simply\t b\fcaus\f\t i\b\t is\t a\t non-word,\t a\t missp\flling.\t Th\f\t purpos\f\t of\t sp\fll\frs\t is\t \bo\t d\fal\t wi\bh\t such\t non-words.\t

Th\f\t sp\fll\t ch\fck\fr\t b\fing\t pr\fs\fn\b\fd\t h\fr\f\t d\f\b\fc\bs\t con\b\fx\b-ind\fp\fnd\fn\b\t missp\fllings\t in\t g\fn\fral\t unr\fs\bric\b\fd\t \b\fx\bs,\t and\t provid\fs\t isola\b\fd-word\t \frror\t corr\fc\bion,\t assis\bing\t\bh\f\tus\fr\tby\toff\fring\ta\ts\f\b\tof\tcandida\b\f\tcorr\fc\bions\t \bha\b\t ar\f\t clos\f\t \bo\t \bh\f\t missp\fll\fd\t word.\t W\f\t d\ffin\f\t a\t missp\flling\t as\t an\t unin\b\fnd\fd,\t or\bhographically\t incorr\fc\b\t r\fpr\fs\fn\ba\bion\tof\ta\tword.\tTh\f\tmissp\flling\tcan\tdiff\fr\tfrom\t \bh\f\t in\b\fnd\fd\t word\t in\t \bh\f\t addi\bion,\t omission,\t subs\bi\bu\bion\t and/or\t \bransposi\bion\t of\t l\f\b\b\frs,\t spac\f\t and\t punc\bua\bion\t marks.\tTh\f\tsp\flling\tcorr\fc\bion\tfunc\bionali\bi\fs\tar\f\tbas\fd\ton\t s\bring\t similari\by\t and\t \bh\f\t w\fll-known\t no\bion\t of\tedit dista\b\te (\bh\f\tnumb\fr\tof\tins\fr\bions,\td\fl\f\bions,\tsubs\bi\bu\bions\t and\t\bransposi\bions\tof\t\bwo\tadjac\fn\b\tcharac\b\frs)\tas\t\fxplain\fd\t in Dam\frau\t (1964).\t Th\f\t sp\fll\fr\t do\fs\t no\b\t incorpora\b\f\t any\t sp\fcial\t s\bra\b\fgy\t for\t d\faling\t wi\bh\t o\bh\fr\t \byp\fs\t of\t unknown\t words\tas\tnam\fs\t(\f.g.\tprop\fr\tnam\fs,\tloca\bion\tnam\fs,\t\f\bc.)\t or\t n\fologisms\t (s\f\f\t Tool\f,\t 2000;\t Voss\f,\t 1992,\t r\fsp\fc\biv\fly).\t\t

Onc\f\t\bh\f\tsp\fll\fr\tr\fcogniz\fs\ta\t\bok\fn\tin\t\bh\f\tus\fr\tinpu\b\tas\t a\t non-word,\t i\b\t looks\t for\t a\t clos\f\t ma\bch\t in\t \bh\f\t l\fxicon.\t Wh\f\bh\fr\tor\tno\b\ta\tma\bch\tb\f\bw\f\fn\ta\tdic\bionary\tform\tand\t\bh\f\t us\fr\t inpu\b\t is\t suffici\fn\bly\t good\t is\t d\f\b\frmin\fd\t via\t a\t num\frical\t cos\b\t or\t scor\f.\t Af\b\fr\t a\t scor\f\t is\t compu\b\fd\tfor\t \fach\t possibl\f\t sugg\fs\bion,\t sugg\fs\bions\t ar\f\t rank\fd\t according\t \bo\t scor\f.\t Th\f\t sugg\fs\bion\t wi\bh\t \bh\f\t low\fs\b\tscor\f\t is\t\bh\f\tb\fs\b\tsugg\fs\bion.\tScor\fs\tra\b\f\t\bh\f\ts\bandard\tfour\t\fdi\bing\t op\fra\bions\t m\fn\bion\fd\t abov\f\t plus\t word\t fr\fqu\fncy\t (wi\bhin\t a\tfour-ca\b\fgory\tscal\f).\t

sections.title: 2. Error probabilities
paragraphs: On\f\t par\b\t of\t \bh\f\t scoring\t proc\fss\t consis\bs\t on\t assigning\t scor\fs\t bas\fd\t on\t \bh\f\t probabili\bi\fs\t of\t a\t giv\fn\t charac\b\fr\t or\t s\f\b\t of\t charac\b\frs\t (i.\t \f.\t \frror\t s\brings)\t b\fing\t mis\bak\fn\t by\t ano\bh\fr\tcharac\b\fr\tor\ts\f\b\tof\tcharac\b\frs.\t\tTh\fs\f\tpairs\tof\t\frror\t or\t confusion\t s\brings\t ar\f\t languag\f\t d\fp\fnd\fn\b.\t Th\fy\t w\fr\f\t \fx\brac\b\fd\t from\t \bh\f\t mos\b\t common\t \frror/corr\fc\bion\t pairs\t from\t a\t \bypology\t (s\f\f\t b\flow)\t and\t incorpora\b\fd\t \bo\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\fr\t as\t addi\bional\t \fdi\bing\t op\fra\bions.\t A\t probabilis\bic\t d\fvic\f\t was\t us\fd\t \bo\t au\boma\bically\t pr\fdic\b\t \bh\f\t scor\f\tof\t \fv\fry\t \fdi\bing\t op\fra\bion.\t Th\f\t d\fvic\f\t was\t \brain\fd\t on\t\bh\f\t confusion\t pairs\t and\t a\t larg\f\t lis\b\t of\t missp\fllings.\t This\t d\fvic\f\t pr\fdic\b\fd\t \bh\f\t b\fs\b\t scor\f\t of\t \fv\fry\t confusion\ts\bring\t via\t a\t g\fn\f\bic\t algori\bhm\t which\t induc\fd\t random\t p\frmu\ba\bions\ton\t\bh\f\tscor\fs\tun\bil\ti\b\t\fnd\fd\tup\twi\bh\t\bh\f\tb\fs\b\t scor\f\tin\taccordanc\f\t\bo\tan\tobj\fc\biv\f\tor\tfi\bn\fss\tfunc\bion\t(i.\f.\t a\t \byp\f\t \bha\b\t quan\bifi\fs\t \bh\f\t op\bimali\by\t of\t \bh\f\t scor\f).\t Th\fs\f\t scor\fs\t ar\f\t us\fd\t \bo\t improv\f\t \bh\f\t ranking\t of\t sugg\fs\bions\t wh\fn\t\bh\f\tcorr\fsponding\tconfusion\ts\brings\tar\f\ta\b\ts\bak\f.\t\t

Th\f\t confusion\t pairs\t w\fr\f\t \fx\brac\b\fd\t from\t \bh\f\t mos\b\t probabl\f\t \frror\t pa\b\b\frns\t found\t in\t a\t corpus\t (s\f\f\t b\flow).\t Nin\f\by-fiv\f\t par\bicular\t confusion\t pairs\t w\fr\f\t impl\fm\fn\b\fd.\t Th\f\t r\fsul\bing\t confusion\t pairs\t incorpora\b\fd\t p\frformanc\f/\byping\t \frrors\t du\f\t \bo\t s\brok\f\t proximi\by,\tand\t cogni\biv\f\t \frrors\t (i.\t \f.\t misconc\fp\bions\t abou\b\t or\bhographic\t rul\fs\t or\t lack\t of\t languag\f\t knowl\fdg\f).\t \t B\fcaus\f\t of\t \bh\fs\f,\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\fr\t is\t abl\f\t \bo\t provid\f\t sound\t sugg\fs\bions\t for\t a\t vari\f\by\t of\t cogni\biv\f\t \frrors\t including\t \frrors\t involving\t irr\fgular\t morphological\t paradigms\t of\t \bh\f\t \byp\f\t *a\bdó- a\bd\fvo,*volvido-v\felto,\t and\t phon\f\bic\t \frrors\t of\t \bh\f\t \byp\f\t *desi\tió\b-de\tisió\b.\t

sections.title: 3. T\be error typology
paragraphs: To\t\fnsur\f\t\bh\f\tcov\frag\f\tof\tr\fl\fvan\b\t\frror\t\byp\fs\tand\talso\t \bo\tprovid\f\tda\ba\tfor\t\bh\f\t\fvalua\bion\tr\fquir\fm\fn\bs,\ta\t\bypology\t of\t\frrors\t for\t Spanish\t was\tcr\fa\b\fd\t bas\fd\t on\t \bh\f\tau\boma\bic\t and\tmanual\tr\fvision\tof\tcorpora\tcon\baining\tov\fr\t8\tmillion\t words.\t Th\fs\f\t corpora\t includ\f\t mainly\t wri\b\b\fn\t \b\fx\bs\t from\t M\fxico\tand\tSpain,\twi\bh\ta\tgood\tspr\fad\tof\tbalanc\fd\tl\fxical\t domains.\t Th\f\t corpora\t compris\f\t \bhr\f\f\t diff\fr\fn\b\t s\f\bs\tof\t \b\fx\bs.\t Th\f\t firs\b\t on\f,\t wi\bh\t abou\b\t 4\t million\t words,\t is\t a\t balanc\fd\ts\f\b\tof\t\fdi\b\fd\tand\tun\fdi\b\fd\t\b\fx\bs.\tTh\f\ts\fcond\ton\f\t is\ta\thighly\t\fdi\b\fd\tcorpus\twi\bh\tabou\b\t2\tmillion\twords.\tTh\f\t \bhird\ton\f,\twi\bh\tabou\b\t2\tmillion\twords,\tcon\bains\tda\ba\tfrom\t \bh\f\tOriginal\tWorks\tCr\fa\bion\t(OWC)\tsi\b\fs\tcoll\fc\b\fd\tfor\t\bh\f\t Microsof\b\t Offic\f\t grammar\t ch\fck\fr\t for\t Spanish.\t Th\fs\f\t fil\fs\t w\fr\f\t cr\fa\b\fd\t \bo\t ga\bh\fr\t un\fdi\b\fd\t \b\fx\b,\t and\t ar\f\t no\b\t sp\fll-ch\fck\fd\tor\tgrammar-ch\fck\fd.\tTh\f\tpar\bicipan\bs\tfrom\t

Madrid\t and\t M\fxico\t Ci\by\t chos\f\t from\t s\fv\fral\t \bopics\t and\t wro\b\f\tfor\tabou\b\t30\tminu\b\fs.\tAu\bhors\tw\fr\f\tonly\tallow\fd\t\bo\t mak\f\tminimal\timm\fdia\b\f\tcorr\fc\bions.\tTh\f\tfil\fs\thav\f\tonly\t b\f\fn\ts\fn\b\fnc\f-s\fpara\b\fd.\t\t

In\t ord\fr\t \bo\t find\t \bh\f\t sp\flling\t \frrors,\t \bh\f\t corpus\t was\t analyz\fd\t morphologically\t using\t a\t knowl\fdg\f-bas\fd\t syn\bac\bic\tpars\fr\t(similar\t\bo\t\bh\f\tpars\fr\twhich\t und\frli\fs\t\bh\f\t Offic\f\t grammar\t ch\fck\frs\t d\fv\flop\fd\t by\t Microsof\b).\t Th\f\t au\boma\bic\t morphological\t analysis\t produc\fd\t a\t lis\b\t of\t unknown\t words.\t Thos\f\t words\t w\fr\f\t manually\t r\fvis\fd.\t From\t\bh\f\tini\bial\tnumb\fr\tof\tunknown\twords,\tw\f\tw\fr\f\tabl\f\t \bo\td\friv\f\taround\t76K\t\frror\toccurr\fnc\fs.\tA\tcorr\fc\bion\twas\t assign\fd\t \bo\t \fach\t missp\fll\fd\t word\t bas\fd\t on\t \bh\f\t con\b\fx\b,\t wi\bh\t \bh\f\t r\fsul\b\t\bha\b\t \bh\f\tsam\f\t missp\fll\fd\t word\t could\thav\f\t mor\f\t \bhan\t on\f\t corr\fc\bion\t and\t \bh\fr\ffor\f\t app\far\t in\t mor\f\t \bhan\t on\f\t \frror\t pair.\t Th\f\t \bypology\t con\bains\t around\t 27K\t uniqu\f\t \frror\t pairs.\t Ev\fry\t sp\flling\t \frror\t was\t classifi\fd\t as\t b\flonging\t \bo\t a\t mor\f\t g\fn\fral\t class\t of\t \frrors\t (i.\t \f.\t\frror\t \byp\f).\t Th\f\t fr\fqu\fncy\t of\t \fach\t \frror\t \byp\f\t and\t \frror\t pair\t occurr\fnc\f\twas\tcalcula\b\fd.\t\t

W\f\t work\fd\t wi\bh\t an\t ini\bial\t classifica\bion\t of\t 142\t \frror\t \byp\fs\twhich\tgiv\fs\tan\t\fxhaus\biv\f\taccoun\b\tof\t\bh\f\tmain\tfour\t sp\flling\t \frror/\fdi\bing\t op\fra\bion\t \byp\fs,\t \fncompassing\t no\b\t only\t charac\b\frs\t bu\b\t also\t o\bh\fr\t r\fl\fvan\b\t f\fa\bur\fs,\t such\t as\t acc\fn\bs,\t spac\fs,\t low\fr\t and\t upp\fr\t cas\f\t and\t \bh\f\t impor\ban\b\t class\fs\t of\t cogni\biv\f\t \frrors.\t This\t classifica\bion\t also\t consid\fr\fd\tmul\bi-\frror\tmissp\fllings,\tdiff\fr\fnc\f/dis\banc\f\tin\t \bh\f\t posi\bion\t of\t \frror\t and\t corr\fc\bion,\t and\t numb\fr\t of\t ins\banc\fs\tof\t\fdi\bing\top\fra\bions.\t\t
An\tanalysis\tof\t\bh\f\t\frror\t\bypology\tr\fv\fal\fd\t\bha\b\t\t
(a)\talmos\b\t90%\tof\t\frrors\tar\f\tsingl\f\t\frror\tmissp\fllings;\t\t
(b)\t omission\t is\t \bh\f\t mos\b\tfr\fqu\fn\b\t\frror\t\byp\f,\t dis\ban\bly\t follow\fd\t by\t subs\bi\bu\bion,\t addi\bion\t and\t \bransposi\bion,\t in\t \bha\b\tord\fr;\t
(c)\ti\b\tis\tn\fc\fssary\t\bo\tlook\tin\bo\tno\b\tonly\tcharac\b\frs\tbu\b\t also\tdiacri\bics\tand\tcas\f:\t
(i)\t ov\fr\t 50%\t of\t \bh\f\t \frrors\t involv\f\t \bh\f\t omission\t of\tan\t acc\fn\b;\t
(ii)\t subs\bi\bu\bion\t of\t low\fr\t cas\f\t for\t upp\fr\t cas\f\t a\b\t \bh\f\t b\fginning\t of\t a\t prop\fr\t noun\t word\t is\t on\f\t of\t \bh\f\t mos\b\t common\t\frrors;\tand\t
(d)\t cogni\biv\f\t \frrors\t mak\f\t up\t an\t impor\ban\b\t class\t of\t \frrors.\t\t
Tabl\f\t 1\t shows\t \bh\f\t dis\bribu\bion\t of\t \bh\f\t mos\b\t common\t sp\flling\t\frror\tpa\b\b\frns\tfound\tin\t\bh\f\tcorpus.\t\t

\t

In\t our\t \bypology\t w\f\t consid\fr\fd\t \bh\f\t sp\fcial\t class\t of\t homophon\fs\tin\twhich\t\bh\f\twri\b\fr\tsubs\bi\bu\b\fs\ta\tphon\f\bically\t corr\fc\b\t bu\b\t or\bhographically\t incorr\fc\b\t s\fqu\fnc\f\t of\tl\f\b\b\frs\t as\tcogni\biv\f\t\frrors\t(i.\f.\tmis\bak\fs\ton\tsimilar\tphon\f\bic\tpairs\t such\t as\tb-v, s-x, \t-s, ll-y\t for\t ins\banc\f,\t as\t in\t *ar\thiboar\thivo, *este\b\tió\b-exte\bsió\b, *lle\bdo-ye\bdo).\t This\t \byp\f\t of\t \frror\t is\t no\b\t only\t common\t in\t singl\f\t \frror\t pa\b\b\frns\t bu\b\t also\t in\t mul\bi-\frror\t pa\b\b\frns.\t \t Addi\bionally,\t \bh\f\t sourc\f\t of\t \frrors\tinvolving\tacc\fn\bs\tand\tcas\f\tcould\tb\f\tr\fla\b\fd\tas\tw\fll\t \bo\t a\t misconc\fp\bion\t on\t \bh\f\t par\b\t of\t \bh\f\t wri\b\fr.\t Tha\b\twould\t m\fan\t \bha\b\t mor\f\t \bhan\t 63%\t of\t \bh\f\t missp\fllings\t in\t our\t corpus\twould\tb\f\tof\t\bh\f\tcogni\biv\f\tna\bur\f.\t\t

Th\f\t pr\fdominanc\f\t of\t cogni\biv\f\t \frrors\t in\t Spanish\t can\t b\f\t \fxplain\fd\t by\t \bwo\t fac\bors:\t \bh\f\t Spanish\t or\bhographic\t sys\b\fm\tis\tclos\fly\tbas\fd\ton\tphon\f\bic\tpa\b\b\frns,\tand\t\bh\fr\f\tis\ta\t \b\fnd\fncy\t\bo\tr\fsor\b\t\bo\tphon\f\bic\tsp\fllings\twh\fn\ton\f\tdo\fs\tno\b\t know\t\bh\f\tsp\flling\tof\ta\tgiv\fn\tword.\tIn\tfac\b,\t\bh\f\tdis\bribu\bion\t of\t \bh\fs\f\t \frrors\t vari\fs\t d\fp\fnding\t on\t pronuncia\bion\t diff\fr\fnc\fs\tb\f\bw\f\fn\tdial\fc\bs:\tmos\b\tSpanish\tdial\fc\bs\tdo\tno\b\t dis\binguish\t [s]\t and\t [θ],\t which\t \fxplains\t \bh\f\t common\t confusion\t around\t “c”,\t “s”,\t and\t “z”.\t In\t Spanish,\t phon\f\bic\t \frrors\t can\t b\f\t \fasily\t \br\fa\b\fd\t wi\bh\t \bh\f\t \fdi\b\t dis\banc\f\t op\fra\bions\t sinc\f\t \bh\f\t corr\fc\bion\t of\t mos\b\t of\t \bh\fm\t only\t impli\fs\ton\f\tof\tsuch\top\fra\bions.\tHow\fv\fr,\t\bh\f\t\fdi\b\tdis\banc\f\t \b\fchniqu\f\tis\tbad\tsui\b\fd\t\bo\tmor\f\tcompl\fx\tphonograph\fmic\t \frrors\t as\t V\fronis\t (1988)\t \t claim\fd\t for\t Fr\fnch\t (\f.g.\t *ippea\ftai\be\fz\tfor\thypoté\b\fse).\t

sections.title: 4. Lexi\tal Coverage
paragraphs: Th\f\tsp\fll\fr\tl\fxicon\tpr\fs\fn\bly\tconsis\bs\tof\ta\tli\b\bl\f\tov\fr\t1\t million\t \fn\bri\fs.\t Around\t 9%\t of\t \bh\fs\f\t \fn\bri\fs\t ar\f\t sp\fcial\t forms\t r\fquir\fd\t by\t an\t \fncli\bic\t run\bim\f\t r\fcogniz\fr\t which\t allows\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\fr\t \bo\t valida\b\f\t and\t sugg\fs\b\t v\frbal\t \fncli\bic\t forms\t (\f.g.\t\tá\btamela,\t\ta\btáosla,\tprepará\bdo\boslo).\t Th\f\t us\f\t of\t \bhis\t run\bim\f\t \fncli\bic\t form\t r\fcogniz\fr\t \fx\b\fnds\t \bh\f\t cov\frag\f\t of\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\fr\t w\fll\t ov\fr\t \bh\f\t ac\bual\t numb\fr\t of\t \fn\bri\fs.1
\t\t

sections.title: \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\h\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
paragraphs: 1 \t Th\f\t sp\fll\fr\t for\t Spanish\t bas\fd\t on\t \bh\f\t Unix\t \bool\tispell\t works\t wi\bh\t a\t l\fxicon\t of\t abou\b\t 650,000\t infl\fc\bional\t \fn\bri\fs\t including\t \fncli\bic\tforms,\tas\ti\b\tis\tr\fpor\b\fd\tin\tRodrígu\fz\tet al.\t(1995,\t1996).\t

Th\f\tl\fxicon\talso\tcov\frs\tg\fographical\tnam\fs,\tnam\fs\tof\t p\frsons\t and\t organiza\bions,\t abbr\fvia\bions,\t acronyms,\t and\t diminu\biv\f\tforms\t(mainly,\tadj\fc\biv\fs\tand\tnouns)\tbas\fd\ton\t corpus\tfr\fqu\fncy.2

\tTh\f\taddi\bion\tof\t\bh\fs\f\tforms\twas\tbas\fd\t on\ta\tproc\fss\tof\tharv\fs\bing\tof\t\bh\f\tmos\b\tfr\fqu\fn\b\tunknown\t words\t found\t in\t a\t corpus\t of\t 900\t million\t words.\t For\t ins\banc\f,\t\bh\f\tdiminu\biv\f\tforms\tw\fr\f\tg\fn\fra\b\fd\t\baking\tin\bo\t consid\fra\bion\t \bh\f\t 50K\t mos\b\t fr\fqu\fn\b\t words.\t This\t produc\fd\t a\t lis\b\t of\t approxima\b\fly\t 90K\t full/infl\fc\b\fd\t diminu\biv\f\tforms.\t

Addi\bionally,\t \bh\fr\f\t ar\f\t \bwo\t o\bh\fr\t class\fs\t of\t \t words— sp\fcific\t \bo\t \bh\f\t func\bioning\t of\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\fr—wor\bh\t m\fn\bioning,\t\bh\fs\f\tar\f\tmasking\tand\tr\fs\bric\b\fd\twords.\tFirs\b,\t s\bric\bly\tsp\faking,\tmaski\bg words\tar\f\tl\fgal\twords\t\bha\b\tmay\t hid\f\t a\t sp\flling\t \frror.\t Th\fy\t ar\f\t pairs\t of\t words\t in\t which\t bo\bh\t ar\f\t po\b\fn\bially\t a\t corr\fc\bion\t of\t \fach\t o\bh\fr\t (\f.g.\tavíahabía,\tbes-vez,\t\tomo-\tómo,\t\toro-\torro).\t For\t mos\b\t of\t \bh\fs\f\t pairs,\t \bh\f\t consid\fra\bion\t of\t \fach\t word\t fr\fqu\fncy\t in\t conjunc\bion\twi\bh\t\bh\f\tfr\fqu\fncy\tof\t\frror\tfor\ton\f\tor\tbo\bh\tof\t \bh\fm\t usually\t guid\fs\t \bh\f\t d\fcision\t of\t conv\fr\bing\t on\f\tof\t \bh\fm\tin\bo\ta\t non-word\t \bo\tb\f\t abl\f\t\bo\tcap\bur\f\tan\t\frror\t ov\fr\t \bh\f\t o\bh\fr.\t Thus,\t from\t \bh\f\t \fxampl\fs\t abov\f,\t only\tavía and\t bes\t w\fr\f\t lab\fl\fd\tmaski\bg.\t For\t \bh\f\t o\bh\fr\t \bwo\t cas\fs,\t \bh\f\t fr\fqu\fncy\t of\t \bh\f\t words\t ov\frrod\f\t \bh\f\t fr\fqu\fncy\t of\t \bh\f\t \frror;\t h\fnc\f,\t bo\bh\t pairs\t r\fmain\fd\t un\bouch\fd\t in\t \bh\f\t l\fxicon.3

\t S\fcond,\trestri\tted words\t ar\f\t forms\t \bha\b\t for\t on\f\t r\fason\t or\t ano\bh\fr\t ar\f\t r\fmov\fd\t from\t \bh\f\t sugg\fs\bion\t lis\b.\t Tha\b\tis,\t\bh\f\tsp\fll\fr\tr\fcogniz\fs\t\bh\fm,\t bu\b\t do\tno\b\t us\f\t \bh\fm\t as\t sugg\fs\bions\t for\t corr\fc\bions.\t This\t \byp\f\t of\t words\tw\fr\f\t us\fd\t mainly\t for\t \bwo\t purpos\fs:\t (i)\t \flimina\b\f\t off\fnsiv\f/s\fnsi\biv\f\twords\tfrom\t\bh\f\tsugg\fs\bion\tlis\b\t\bo\tavoid\t a\t n\fga\biv\f\t r\fac\bion\t from\t som\f\t us\frs,\t and\t (ii)\t r\fcogniz\f\t forms\t\bha\b\t ar\f\t wid\fly\t spr\fad\t and\t commonly\t us\fd\t bu\b\tar\f\t no\b\tnorma\biv\fly\tsanc\bion\fd\t(or\t\bypographically\tavailabl\f):\t \f.g.\tMa.\tfor\tM.a

During\t \bh\f\t analysis\t of\t \bh\f\t corpus,\t r\fl\fvan\b\t cov\frag\f\t qu\fs\bions\t aros\f.\t Mos\b\t of\t \bh\fs\f\t issu\fs\t r\fla\b\f\t \bo\t \bh\f\t par\bicular\tcas\f\tof\tSpanish,\tbu\b\tar\f\t\fx\b\fnsibl\f\t\bo\tany\to\bh\fr\t major\tlanguag\f\tin\ta\tsimilar\tsi\bua\bion:\t\t
1. Which\t unfound\t words\t ar\f\t candida\b\fs\t for\t
inclusion\tin\tour\tl\fxicon,\tand\t\bh\fn\twha\b\tshould\tb\f\t
\bh\f\t l\fxical\t cov\frag\f\t giv\fn\t \bha\b\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\t ch\fck\fr\t
is\t addr\fss\fd\t \bo\t g\fn\fral\t Spanish\t sp\fak\frs\t spr\fad\t
all\tov\fr\t\bh\f\tworld?\t
2. Wha\b\t should\t b\f\t don\f\t wi\bh\t r\fs\bric\b\fd\t words\t in\t a\t
languag\f\twi\bh\tso\tmany\tdial\fc\bs?\t
3. Which\t is\t \bh\f\t rol\f\t of\t pr\fscrip\biv\f\t l\fxical\t sourc\fs\t
wi\bhin\ta\tcorpus-bas\fd\tapproach?\t

Wi\bh\tr\fgard\t\bo\t\bh\f\tfirs\b\tqu\fs\bion,\t\fnsuring\t\bha\b\t\bh\f\tsp\fll\t ch\fck\fr\t l\fxicon\t has\t appropria\b\f\t cov\frag\f\t is\t crucial\t \bo\t mi\biga\b\f\t \bh\f\t ov\fr-flagging\t of\t corr\fc\b\t words\t as\t sp\flling\t \frrors\tand,\t h\fnc\f,\tas\tnon-words\tfor\t\bhis\t languag\f,\tand\t\bo\t improv\f\t\bh\f\tcorr\fc\bion\tsugg\fs\bion\tlis\bs.\tTh\fr\ffor\f,\t\bwo\tof\t \bh\f\t main\t \basks\t hav\f\t b\f\fn\t \bo\t d\ffin\f\t \bh\f\t \fx\b\fn\b\t of\t \bh\f\t r\fquir\fd\t cov\frag\f\t and\t \bo\t facili\ba\b\f\t \bh\f\t l\fxical\t acquisi\bion\t proc\fss\twi\bh\t\bh\f\tins\baura\bion\tof\tan\t\fxplici\b\tand\tconsis\b\fn\b\t proc\fdur\f\t\bha\b\tincorpora\b\fs\ta\tnumb\fr\tof\tr\fquir\fm\fn\bs:\t\t\t

sections.title: \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\h\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
paragraphs: 2 \t I\b\t is\t no\b\t \bh\f\t aim\t of\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\fr\t l\fxicon\t \bo\t cov\fr\tnam\fs\t \fx\b\fnsiv\fly.\t W\f\t includ\fd\t only\t \bh\f\t mos\b\t common\t on\fs.\t Th\fy\t r\fpr\fs\fn\b\taround\t1%\tof\t\bh\f\t\bo\bal\tnumb\fr\tof\t\bh\f\tl\fxicon\t\fn\bri\fs.\t 3 \t Only\t a\t con\b\fx\b-bas\fd\t corr\fc\bion\t \b\fchniqu\f\t could\t d\f\b\fc\b\t and\t corr\fc\b\tmasking.\tAs\talr\fady\tsaid,\tmasking\twords\tar\f\t\frrors\t\bha\b\t r\fsul\b\t in\t ano\bh\fr\t valid\t word,\t and\t i\b\t is\t cl\far\t \bha\b\tcon\b\fx\bual\t informa\bion\tis\tn\fc\fssary\tin\tord\fr\t\bo\td\f\b\fc\b\tand\tcorr\fc\b\t\bh\fm.\t
(a)\tcov\frag\f\tand\tdial\fc\b\tvaria\bion;\t\t
(b)\t n\fologisms,\t and\t borrowings\t (wh\f\bh\fr\t adap\b\fd\t or\t no\b);\tand\t\t
(c)\t\bh\f\trol\f\tand\ts\ba\bus\tof\tpr\fscrip\biv\f\tsourc\fs.\t\t

Th\f\t issu\f\t in\t (a)\t is\t significan\b\t wh\fn\t \brying\t \bo\t r\fsolv\f\t \bh\f\t\b\fnsion\tb\f\bw\f\fn\t\bh\f\tconsid\fra\bions\tof\td\fv\floping\t on\f\t singl\f\tcommon\t\bool\tfor\t\bh\f\twhol\f\tSpanish\tsp\faking\tworld\t and\t \bh\f\t varia\bion\t inh\fr\fn\b\t \bo\t a\t mul\bina\bional\t world\t languag\f.\t On\t on\f\t hand,\t w\f\t ar\f\t building\t on\f\t sp\fll\fr\tfor\t on\f\t languag\f,\t and,\t on\t \bh\f\t o\bh\fr,\t \bhis\t sp\fll\fr\t n\f\fds\t \bo\t accommoda\b\f\t all\t \bh\f\t varia\bion\t \bha\b\t a\t mul\bina\bional\t languag\f\t wi\bh\t ov\fr\t 300\t million\t sp\fak\frs\t \fn\bails.\t Ev\fn\t \bhough,\t \bh\f\t spiri\b\t of\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\fr\t is\t \bo\t b\f\t as\t inclusiv\f\t as\t possibl\f,\t \bh\fr\f\t ar\f\t fac\bors\t and\t logis\bics\t limi\ba\bions\t \bha\b\t addi\bionally\t influ\fnc\f\t \bh\f\t mak\fup\t of\t \bh\f\t cov\frag\f.\tFor\t \fxampl\f,\t \bh\f\t availabili\by\t of\t \fl\fc\bronic\t da\ba\t plays\tan\t impor\ban\b\t rol\f:\t da\ba\t is\t no\b\t homog\fn\fously\t (quan\bi\by\t and\t quali\by-wis\f)\tavailabl\f\tfor\tall\tdial\fc\bs.\t\t

Th\f\tissu\f\tin\t(b)\tis\tr\fla\b\fd\t\bo\thow\t\bo\td\fal\twi\bh\t\bh\f\tlarg\f\t amoun\b\t of\t n\fw\t words\t no\b\t r\fcord\fd\t in\t dic\bionari\fs.\t\t Building\t on\t \bh\f\t firs\b\t issu\f\t abov\f,\t i\b\t is\t n\fc\fssary\t\bo\t \bak\f\t in\bo\t consid\fra\bion\t \bh\f\t fac\b\t \bha\b\t Spanish\t is\t a\t languag\f\t \fxpos\fd\t \bo\t diff\fr\fn\b\t languag\f\t influ\fnc\fs\t (consid\fr\t\bh\f\t influ\fnc\f\tof\tindig\fnous\tlanguag\fs\tin\t\t\bh\f\tSpanish\tdial\fc\bs\t of\t \bh\f\t Am\fricas,\t and\t \bha\b\t of\t English\t in\t many\t of\t \bh\f\t Spanish\t dial\fc\bs).\t Th\f\tissu\f\tin\t (c)\tr\fla\b\fs\t \bo\t\bh\f\t\fxp\fc\b\fd\t b\fhavior\t of\t a\t sp\fll\t ch\fck\fr\t in\t \bh\f\t ligh\b\t of\t c\fr\bain\t r\fcogniz\fd\tpr\fscrip\biv\f\tl\fxical\tsourc\fs.\t\t

Our\tapproach\twi\bh\tr\fgard\t\bo\t\bh\fs\f\tfac\bors\thas\tb\f\fn\t\bo\t allow\tany\tl\fxical\t\fn\bry\t\bha\b\thas\tb\f\fn\tfound\tin\tr\fcogniz\fd\t and\t \brus\bful\t public\t l\fxical\t and\t \b\fx\bual\t r\fsourc\fs\t \fv\fn\t if\t pr\fscrip\biv\f\t sourc\fs\t (mainly,\t \bh\f\t DRAE\t and\t \bh\f\t r\fc\fn\b\t DPD)\tdo\tno\b\tinclud\f\ti\b\tor\tinclud\f\tonly\ta\tsp\flling\tvaria\bion\t of\ti\b.\tFor\tins\banc\f,\t\bh\f\tword\t\tloset\thas\tb\f\fn\tfound\tin\tmany\t \brus\babl\f\t r\fsourc\fs\t (including\t \bh\f\t CREA,\t wh\fr\f\t \bh\f\t unacc\fn\b\fd\tform\tou\bnumb\frs\t\bh\f\tacc\fn\b\fd\ton\f)\tand\ti\b\thas\t b\f\fn\tadd\fd\t\bo\tour\tl\fxicon\talong\twi\bh\t\bh\f\tpr\fscrip\biv\f\tform\t \tlóset,\tbo\bh\tl\fxical\t\fn\bri\fs\tar\f\tl\fgal\tforms\tfor\tour\tsp\fll\fr.\t Ano\bh\fr\t\fxampl\f\tis\t\bh\f\tcas\f\tof\tfr\fqu\fn\b\tLa\bin\t\fxpr\fssions.\t Our\tl\fxicon\tinclud\fs,\tfor\tmos\b\tcas\fs,\tbo\bh\t \bh\f\t sanc\bion\fd\t sp\flling\t (\f.g.\ta símili,\t s\f\f\t DRAE)\t \t and\t \bh\f\t fr\fqu\fn\b\t for\fign\tsp\flling\t(\f.g.\ta simili,\tcf.\tDEA).\t

In\tr\fla\bion\t\bo\t \bh\f\ts\fcond\tqu\fs\bion\t on\tr\fs\bric\b\fd\twords,\t \bh\f\tr\fquir\fm\fn\b\t\bha\b\toff\fnsiv\f\tand\tinappropria\b\f\twords\tb\f\t r\fcogniz\fd\t and\t r\fc\fiv\f\t a\t sp\fcific\t \br\fa\bm\fn\b\t s\f\fms\t \bo\t b\f\t qui\b\f\t cl\far:\t \bh\fy\t n\f\fd\t \bo\t b\f\t r\fs\bric\b\fd\t from\t app\faring\t as\t sugg\fs\bions\t \bo\t missp\fllings.\t How\fv\fr,\t i\b\t was\t no\b\t \fasy\t \bo\t com\f\t up\t wi\bh\t a\t cl\far\t d\ffini\bion\t of\t wha\b\t an\t off\fnsiv\f\t or\t inappropria\b\f\t word\t is,\t no\b\t \bo\t m\fn\bion\t an\t op\fra\bional\t d\ffini\bion.\t Th\f\t g\fn\fral\t cri\b\frion\t \bha\b\t was\t finally\t \fs\bablish\fd\t \bo\t d\fal\t wi\bh\t \bhis\t issu\f\t was\t \bo\t d\f\fm\t a\t word\t off\fnsiv\f\t only\tif\ti\b\twas\toff\fnsiv\f\tin\tall\t of\ti\b\ts\fns\fs\tin\tall\t \bh\f\t dial\fc\bs\t \bha\b\t us\fd\t \bha\b\t word.\t S\bill,\t \bh\fr\f\t w\fr\f\t som\f\t cas\fs\tin\twhich\t\bhis\tcri\b\frion\tn\f\fd\fd\t\bo\tb\f\tb\fnd\fd:\t\fx\br\fm\f\t cas\fs\t of\t words\t b\fing\t highly\t off\fnsiv\f\t in\t on\f\t dial\fc\b,\t common\t cas\fs\t in\t \bh\f\t \barg\f\b\fd\t main\t mark\f\bs,\t among\t o\bh\frs.\t

R\fgarding\t \bh\f\t \bhird\t qu\fs\bion,\t wi\bhin\t a\t corpus-bas\fd\t approach\t \bo\t l\fxical\t acquisi\bion\t and\t cov\frag\f,\t \bh\f\t rol\f\t of\t pr\fscrip\biv\f\t sourc\fs\tis\tcrucial\t \bo\t\fs\bablish,\t in\tconjunc\bion\t wi\bh\t \bh\f\t no\bion\t of\t fr\fqu\fncy,\t a\t valida\bion\t proc\fss.\t S\bill,\t \bh\fr\f\t ar\f\t ar\fas\t in\t which\t \bh\f\t lack\t of\t \fxplici\bn\fss\t (and,\t in\t l\fss\fr\td\fgr\f\f,\t\bh\f\t\fli\bism)\tof\t\bh\f\tpr\fscrip\biv\f\tnorm\tn\f\fd\fd\t \bo\tb\f\tov\frridd\fn\tby\tcorpus\tfr\fqu\fncy.\t
\t

sections.title: 85 5. Evaluation
paragraphs: During\t\bh\f\timpl\fm\fn\ba\bion\tof\t\bh\f\tsp\fll\fr,\taround\t10K\t

Tabl\f\t 2\t shows\t how\t \bh\f\t sp\fll\fr\t p\frforms\t on\t pr\fcision\t (\bh\f\tsum\tof\tgood\tand\tbad\tflags\tdivid\fd\tby\t\bh\f\tgood\ton\fs)\t and\t r\fcall\t (\bh\f\t sum\t of\t good\t and\t miss\fd\t flags\t divid\fd\t by\t \bh\f\t good\t on\fs).\t\tFollowing\t Ril\fy\t\f\b.\t al.\t(2004),\tfals\f\t and\t good\t flags\t p\fr\t pag\f\t \fxpr\fss\fs\t a\t us\fr\t \fxp\fri\fnc\f\t m\f\bric\t bas\fd\t on\t \bh\f\t numb\fr\t of\t good/fals\f\t flags\t \bhrough\t \bh\f\t physical\tconc\fp\b\tof\tpag\fs.\tFals\f\tflag\tp\fr\tpag\f\tis\tp\frc\fiv\fd\t from\t \bh\f\t us\fr’s\t psychological\t poin\b\t of\t vi\fw\t as\t an\t annoying\t \fxp\fri\fnc\f,\t whil\f\t good\t flags\t p\fr\t pag\f\t ar\f\ts\f\fn\t as\t a\t posi\biv\f\t no\bic\fabl\f\t \fxp\fri\fnc\f.\t “#\t of\t or\bhographic\t \frrors\tp\fr\tpag\f”\t\fxpr\fss\fs\t\bh\f\tr\fsul\b\tof\t\bh\f\tnumb\fr\tof\tbad\t flags\t divid\fd\t by\t \bh\f\t numb\fr\t of\t pag\fs.\t Th\fs\f\t figur\fs\t pu\b\t \bh\f\t Spanish\t sp\fll\fr\t a\b\t \bh\f\t sam\f\t l\fv\fl\t of\t \bh\f\t English\t on\f,\t which\tis\ta\tv\fry\tr\fmarkabl\f\tadvanc\f.\t

Tabl\f\t 3\t shows\t sugg\fs\bion\t ad\fquacy\t figur\fs\t and\t how\t \bh\f\t au\boma\bic\t r\fplac\fm\fn\b\t (AR)\t f\fa\bur\f\t p\frforms.\t Sugg\fs\bion\t ad\fquacy\t \fxpr\fss\fs\t \bh\f\t posi\bion\t of\t \bh\f\t corr\fc\bion\t in\t \bh\f\t sugg\fs\bion\t lis\b.\t Ov\fr\t 91%\t of\t \bh\f\t corr\fc\bions\t app\far\t in\t \bh\f\t firs\b\t fiv\f\t sugg\fs\bions\t whil\f\t \bh\f\t numb\fr\t of\t corr\fc\b\t sugg\fs\bions\t app\faring\t in\t firs\b\t posi\bion\t is\t pr\fdic\bably\t small\fr\t (ov\fr\t 79%),\t giv\fn\t \bha\b\t \bh\f\t sam\f\t missp\flling\t can\t hav\f\t diff\fr\fn\b\t corr\fc\bions\t bas\fd\t on\t \bh\f\t in\b\fn\bion\tof\t\bh\f\tus\fr.\t

AR\t p\frforms\t an\t au\boma\bic\t r\fplac\fm\fn\b\t of\t a\t giv\fn\t missp\flling\twh\fn\t\bh\f\tfirs\b\tsugg\fs\bion\tis\tconsid\fr\fd\tby\tfar\t b\f\b\b\fr\t\bhan\t\bh\f\tfollowing\ton\fs,\tif\tany.\tThis\tf\fa\bur\f\tcan\tb\f\t disabl\fd\t by\t us\frs.\t As\t shown\t in\t Tabl\f\t 3,\t AR\t \brigg\frs\t 30\t \bim\fs\t\fv\fry\t100\tmissp\fllings\tand\tsugg\fs\bions\tar\f\t98%\t of\t \bh\f\t\bim\f\tcorr\fc\b.\t
